name: Spostream
tagline: Streaming all sports content through a single source
body:
**Welcome to Streaming-sports.**
> Single source platform for streaming live sporting events [NFL](http://www.nfl.com/) [MLB](http://mlb.mlb.com/home) [NBA](http://www.nba.com/) [NCAA](http://www.ncaa.com/) [BOXING](http://www.toprank.com/) [UFC](http://www.ufc.com/) [WWE](http://www.wwe.com/) [PGA](http://www.pga.com/home) [UEFA](http://www.uefa.com/) [NHL](https://www.nhl.com/) [OLYMPIC](https://www.olympic.org/) 
 
### **Sports content the way it should be**
> You shouldn't have to subscribe to any and every league, conference, ppv or broadcast tv provider under the sun, individually, to watch and enjoy your favorite sports.

### Authors and Contributors
Git at me @kanaka85
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
